# LLMs.txt for Solune Studio


## Website Overview

Solune Studio is a salon management dashboard built with Next.js. It provides a complete solution for managing salon sales, expenses, client promotions, analytics, and business settings in a modern, user-friendly interface.


## Site Structure

- Home (`/`): Landing page with authentication
- Login (`/signin`): User authentication
- Signup (`/signup`): New user registration
- Sales (`/sales`): Sales records and appointment management
- Expenses (`/expenses`): Business expense tracking
- Promotions (`/promotions`): Client directory with WhatsApp marketing
- Analytics (`/analytics`): Business insights with charts and metrics
- Settings (`/settings`): Service and stylist management


## Tech Stack

- Frontend: Next.js 15.5.9, React 19.0.0, TypeScript 5.7.3
- State Management: Zustand 5.0.2 with localStorage persistence
- Styling: Tailwind CSS 3.4.17
- UI Components: Radix UI primitives
- Charts: Recharts 2.15.0
- Date Handling: date-fns 4.1.0, react-day-picker 9.13.0
- Icons: Lucide React 0.468.0
- Notifications: Sonner 1.7.3


## Key Features

- Sales Management: Track appointments, services, payments, and discounts
- Expense Tracking: Monitor business expenses with date filtering
- Client Promotions: Bulk WhatsApp messaging with client directory
- Business Analytics: Revenue insights, service distribution, payment methods
- Service Management: Add/edit services with categories (Men/Women)
- Stylist Management: Manage stylists with gender tracking
- Multi-Select Actions: Bulk operations for client promotions
- Date Filtering: Today, Last 7/30 days, custom date ranges
- Payment Methods: Cash, Card, UPI with color-coded badges
- Export Functionality: CSV export for sales reports
